name: Caff Roulette
description:
Caff Roulette is a little Russian roulette game I made with for the Playdate to mess around with the crank and make a fun little game-toy-thing you could play with friends. 

CONTROLS: 

Press A to load bullets and select menu options

Press B to switch between the barrel and the chamber

Undock the crank and start crankin' to spin the chamber

When on the barrel screen, dock the crack to fire the gun
